00009 #ifndef _h_WEBS_INTERNAL
00010 #define _h_WEBS_INTERNAL 1
00011 
00012 /******************************** Description *********************************/
00013 
00014 /* 
00015  *      Internal GoAhead Web Server header. This defines the Web private APIs
00016  *      Include this header when you want to create URL handlers.
00017  */
00018 
00019 /*********************************** Defines **********************************/
00020 
00021 /*
00022  *      Define this to enable login of web accesses to a file
00023  *              #define WEBS_LOG_SUPPORT 1
00024  *
00025  *      Define this to enable HTTP/1.1 keep alive support
00026  *              #define WEBS_KEEP_ALIVE_SUPPORT 1
00027  *
00028  *      Define this to enable if-modified-since support
00029  *              #define WEBS_IF_MODIFIED_SUPPORT 1
00030  *
00031  *      Define this to support proxy capability and track local vs remote request
00032  *              Note: this is not yet fully implemented.
00033  *              #define WEBS_PROXY_SUPPORT 1
00034  *
00035  *      Define this to support reading pages from ROM
00036  *              #define WEBS_PAGE_ROM 1
00037  *
00038  *      Define this to enable memory allocation and stack usage tracking
00039  *              #define B_STATS 1
00040  */
00041

00122 /********************************** Defines ***********************************/
00123 /* 
00124  *      Read handler flags and state
00125  */
00126 #define WEBS_BEGIN                      0x1                     /* Beginning state */
00127 #define WEBS_HEADER                     0x2                     /* Ready to read first line */
00128 #define WEBS_POST                       0x4                     /* POST without content */
00129 #define WEBS_POST_CLEN          0x8                     /* Ready to read content for POST */
00130 #define WEBS_PROCESSING         0x10            /* Processing request */
00131 #define WEBS_KEEP_TIMEOUT       15000           /* Keep-alive timeout (15 secs) */
00132 #define WEBS_TIMEOUT            60000           /* General request timeout (60) */
00133 
00134 #define PAGE_READ_BUFSIZE       512                     /* bytes read from page files */
00135 #define MAX_PORT_LEN            10                      /* max digits in port number */
00136 #define WEBS_SYM_INIT           64                      /* initial # of sym table entries */
00137 #define WEBS_VERSION_STR        T("2.1.3")      /* version of web server s/w */ 
00138 
00139 /*
00140  *      URL handler structure. Stores the leading URL path and the handler
00141  *      function to call when the URL path is seen.
00142  */ 
00143 typedef struct {
00144         int             (*handler)(webs_t wp, char_t *urlPrefix, char_t *webDir, int arg, 
00145                         char_t *url, char_t *path, 
00146                         char_t *query);                                 /* Callback URL handler function */
00147         char_t  *webDir;                                                /* Web directory if required */
00148         char_t  *urlPrefix;                                             /* URL leading prefix */
00149         int             len;                                                    /* Length of urlPrefix for speed */
00150         int             arg;                                                    /* Argument to provide to handler */
00151         int             flags;                                                  /* Flags */
00152 } websUrlHandlerType;
00153 
00154 /* 
00155  *      Webs statistics
00156  */
00157 typedef struct {
00158         long                    errors;                                 /* General errors */
00159         long                    redirects;
00160         long                    net_requests;
00161         long                    activeNetRequests;
00162         long                    activeBrowserRequests;
00163         long                    timeouts;
00164         long                    access;                                 /* Access violations */
00165         long                    localHits;
00166         long                    remoteHits;
00167         long                    formHits;
00168         long                    cgiHits;
00169         long                    handlerHits;
00170 } websStatsType;
00171 
00172 extern websStatsType websStats;                         /* Web access stats */
00173 
00174 /* 
00175  *      Error code list
00176  */
00177 typedef struct {
00178         int             code;                                                   /* HTTP error code */
00179         char_t  *msg;                                                   /* HTTP error message */
00180 } websErrorType;
00181 
00182 /* 
00183  *      Mime type list
00184  */
00185 typedef struct {
00186         char_t  *type;                                                  /* Mime type */
00187         char_t  *ext;                                                   /* File extension */
00188 } websMimeType;
00189 
00190 /*
00191  *      File information structure.
00192  */
00193 typedef struct {
00194         unsigned long   size;                                   /* File length */
00195         int                             isDir;                                  /* Set if directory */
00196         time_t                  mtime;                                  /* Modified time */
00197 } websStatType;
00198 
00199 /*
00200  *      Compiled Rom Page Index
00201  */
00202 typedef struct {
00203         char_t                  *path;                                  /* Web page URL path */
00204         unsigned char   *page;                                  /* Web page data */
00205         int                             size;                                   /* Size of web page in bytes */
00206         int                             pos;                                    /* Current read position */
00207 } websRomPageIndexType;
00208 
00209 /*
00210  *      Defines for file open.
00211  */
00212 #ifndef CE
00213 #define SOCKET_RDONLY   O_RDONLY
00214 #define SOCKET_BINARY   O_BINARY
00215 #else /* CE */
00216 #define SOCKET_RDONLY   0x1
00217 #define SOCKET_BINARY   0x2
00218 #endif /* CE */

00225 extern char_t                   websHost[64];           /* Name of this host */
00226 extern char_t                   websIpaddr[64];         /* IP address of this host */
00227 extern char_t                   *websHostUrl;           /* URL for this host */
00228 extern char_t                   *websIpaddrUrl;         /* URL for this host */
00229 extern int                              websPort;                       /* Port number */
